item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: Damien Saunders respects your privacy. Any personal information you provide to us including and similar to your name, address, telephone number and e-mail address will not be released, sold, or rented to any 3rd party entities or individuals.

item.title: Terms of Use
item.description: Website usage terms and conditions Welcome to our website. If you continue to browse and use this website you are agreeing to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions of use, which together with our privacy policy govern the relationship with you in relation to this website.
